display_long_description:
Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

[media]

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

[media]

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

[media]

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

[media]

# **CRITICALLY ACCLAIMED**

[media]

Download now and explore VAIL’s free-to-play Citadel, engage in high-intensity 5v5 battles on four new free-to-play maps, and unlock VAIL Combat to discover why VAIL is the highest rated VR Shooter.

#  **TRAINING GROUNDS (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Engage in non-stop action on four free-to-play maps designed to improve skill with weapon pickups and loadout modifiers.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393687_512109028220024_8255635767100546886_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Iyld10ouTaYQ7kNvwHE-jTA&_nc_oc=AdlEhkhHDrnpp8YJPqdyMX-Sbi8-uzRK9crv7y3wjrNwDkfczuOWU9MI2atPTjtlJnY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fhwob2RdZrIXrSfvVLye9w&oh=00_AfQnXShXAeD1TnHCZkQZ7vclGK8tt2-Tjgp4h-x6BDw46g&oe=688720B6)

#  **SOCIAL HUB (FREE-TO-PLAY)**
Challenge others to intense 1v1 battles, get the best score in mini-golf, and unlock VAIL Combat or other rewards by extracting ORE shards from the quarry.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473393292_972139874890841_7067035628286260950_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=AXUK1CNpS2UQ7kNvwEpCa2H&_nc_oc=AdnawGlPF4G7BI6tBgaBAmnj1fQglSZcWUqOR4R-hzxsbkGJQe-0vLlWGa-3uI8tSoY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fhwob2RdZrIXrSfvVLye9w&oh=00_AfRyENm7wLPQvmIAXw9PKBTLZLvXqLNPAywEp_-tVAeBUg&oe=68873269)

#  **VAIL COMBAT (DLC)**
Gain full access to VAIL's complete experience. Dominate in popular team-based and free-for-all game modes as you level up, unlock rewards, and top the leaderboards.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473391906_1043942824415838_4920723583868365724_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=G3ikUl6nGFoQ7kNvwHTt5DR&_nc_oc=Adm2rctIm7ELiDakeb6jDCffHmj68Ls1hwtgej5GLsZmlMimaH8xY2T0-BvIcw2uKFg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=fhwob2RdZrIXrSfvVLye9w&oh=00_AfQsH5VQ6zwZJ7lLQRQjkjCDkggh-nJDy6OOTlSphRJ9sQ&oe=6887425D)
